version_description:
- Optimized for the iPhone 6 & iPhone 6 Plus.
- New Icon.
- Updated the widget to use bigger fonts.

- Fixed a bug where the months since may display incorrectly in your event list.
- Other minor bug fixes.

- Optimized for the iPhone 6 & iPhone 6 Plus.
- New Icon.
- Updated the widget to use bigger fonts.

- Fixed a bug where the months since may display incorrectly in your event list.
- Other minor bug fixes.

- Includes a shiny new Apple Watch app!
- Added Support for 3D Touch (iPhone 6S & iPhone 6S Plus).
- Force Touch on the app icon to jump directly into recent countdowns or create a new one.
- Force Touch on a countdown in your list to peek inside.
- Minor bug fixes.

If you enjoy Days Since, please rate it or leave a review in the App Store!

- Includes a shiny new Apple Watch app!
- Added Support for 3D Touch (iPhone 6S & iPhone 6S Plus).
- Force Touch on the app icon to jump directly into recent countdowns or create a new one.
- Force Touch on a countdown in your list to peek inside.
- Minor bug fixes.

If you enjoy Days Since, please rate it or leave a review in the App Store!

- Updated for iOS 10
- Updated Apple Watch app featuring bigger photos
- Improved data syncing between Apple Watch and your device
- Added additional event icons
- Better scaling for you background photos
- Fixed an issue where long notes could be covered by the keyboard

- Better scaling for you background photos

Updated for iOS 11.
Added new swipe actions in the countdown list on the iPhone.
Fixed a crash that occurred while taking a picture.
Fixed a bug that prevented some users from editing event titles.
Better support for users using 24 hour time.

Your countdowns now sync between devices!
